output: Eco-friendly practices ko lagi plastic ko jagah reusable decorations use gar, natural colors le tika bana, ra tree plantation campaigns suru gar Dashain-Tihar ko samay ma.

instruction: Nepali ma auta inspirational story bata.
output: Pasang Lhamu Sherpa ko story ek inspiration ho, jun ma uniharu Nepal ki pahilo female mountaineer hun jasma Everest summit gare. Unle hami sabailai dream chase garna sikai diyen.

instruction: Nepali students ko lagi stress manage garna 3 easy techniques suggest gara.
output: 1. Daily meditation ya yoga gar. 2. Time management ma kaam garera workload minimize gar. 3. Hobbies ma time spend garera refresh feel gar.

instruction: Nepali literature ko auta famous writer ko naam ra unko karya ko naam mention gara.
output: Famous Nepali writer ho Laxmi Prasad Devkota, ra unko karya 'Muna Madan' dherai prasiddha cha.

instruction: Nepal ko current energy crisis solve garna ke steps linu parcha?
output: Energy crisis solve garna renewable sources ma investment gar, energy conservation awareness campaigns suru gar, ra cross-border energy partnerships expand gar.

instruction: Ekta 2-minute relaxation exercise ko steps suggest gara.
output: 1. Comfortable position ma base, eyes close gar. 2. Deep breath in liera 5 seconds samma hold gar. 3. Slowly exhale gar, yo process 4-5 choti repeat gar.

instruction: Nepali youth ko entrepreneurship ma interest badhauna ke campaigns effective huncha?
output: Entrepreneurship ma interest badhauna startup success stories ko events, mentorship programs, ra innovation competitions dherai effective huncha.

instruction: Nepal ma education inequality reduce garna kasari sakinchha?
output: Remote areas ma access sudharna online education platforms use garna sakinchha, free educational resources provide gar, ra equal scholarship opportunities dina parcha.

instruction: Nepali traditional art form ko auta example ra tesko importance explain gara.
output: Nepali traditional art form ko example ho Paubha painting, jun Buddhist culture ko visual representation ho ra spiritual significance hold garcha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta morning mantra lekha jun positive energy dincha.
output: 'Mero din ramro hunecha, mero sabai kaam safal hunecha, ra sabai thau ma positivity cha.'

instruction: Nepali ko current political challenges explain garna short summary de.
output: Nepali ko current political challenges ma stability ko kami, frequent government changes, ra development policies ko slow implementation sammilit cha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta motivational message lekha.
output: 'Je gare pani afno 100% dinu. Samasya haru temporary hun, tapaiko mehnat le future brighter banauchha.'

instruction: Nepali ma weather ko barema auta short update gar.
output: Kathmandu ma ajkal ko weather cloudy cha, halka chiso cha ra din ma thikai ramailo temperature cha.

instruction: Ekta short travel itinerary banauna help gara Pokhara ko lagi.
output: 1. Day 1: Phewa Lake ma boating gar ra Tal Barahi Temple visit gar. 2. Day 2: Sarangkot ma sunrise her, paragliding gar. 3. Day 3: Davis Falls, Gupteshwor Cave ra Bindabasini Temple visit gar.

instruction: Nepali traditional attire ko auta example ra tesko description de.
output: Traditional attire ho 'Daura Suruwal' (male) ra 'Gunyo Cholo' (female). Yo attire cultural events ra special occasions ma lagaincha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta 3-sentence motivational speech lekha.
output: Tapaiko mehnat le ajhai dherai opportunities khulcha. Harek din ek naya chance ho afno dream chase garna. Samasya haru chai sikne abaash matra ho.

instruction: Nepali ma auta positive social behavior explain gar.
output: Positive social behavior ho mutual respect dekhau, jasle community ma harmony leauchha ra sabailai samanta ko bhaaw dinchha.

instruction: Nepali ma technology ko development ko auta recent example de.
output: Recent example ho Nepal ma digital payment systems jaise eSewa ra Khalti ko development, jasle cashless transactions promote gareko cha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta dream job ko description lekh.
output: Mero dream job ho software engineer banna. Flexible work environment, creativity le kaam garna inspiration dinu ra duniya ma impact garna milos bhanne soch ho.

instruction: Nepali ma auta self-discipline ko example dinus.
output: Self-discipline ko example ho daily exercise routine banaera consistently follow garnu, jasma excuses nakam garikanchha.

instruction: Nepal ma ajkal ko youth ma sabai bhanda popular activity k ho?
output: Ajkal ko youth ma sabai bhanda popular activity ho social media use garne ra trekking jasto outdoor adventures ma jaana.

instruction: Ekta educational app suggest gara Nepali students ko lagi.
output: Nepali students ko lagi MeroSchool app ramro ho, jasle online classes, study materials, ra exams preparation tools provide garcha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta traditional food describe gar.
output: Dal Bhat tarkari ek traditional Nepali food ho, jas ma steamed rice, lentil soup, seasonal vegetables ra achar sammilit huncha.

instruction: Nepali culture ma marriage ceremony kasari celebrate garincha? Short summary de.
output: Nepali culture ma marriage ceremony ma rituals jastai kanyadaan, sindoor halne, ra reception party garincha, jasma dherai music ra dancing pani huncha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta fitness-related tips de.
output: Fitness maintain garna din ko 30 minutes walk gar, balanced diet follow gar ra sugary drinks avoid gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta positive habit sikna kasari start garna sakchhau?
output: Positive habit sikna small steps le suru gar, daily consistent practice gar, ra progress track garna reminder set gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta startup idea propose gara.
output: Ekta startup idea ho eco-friendly packaging products banera Nepali local market ra export ko lagi promote garne.

instruction: Nepali ma auta quick morning routine plan gar.
output: 1. Early 6 baje uth, 2. 10-minute yoga gar, 3. Healthy breakfast kha, ra 4. Din ko priorities list bana.

instruction: Nepali wildlife ko auta endangered species ko naam de ra usko importance explain gara.
output: Endangered species ho Red Panda, jun Nepal ko Himalayan forests ma paaincha. Usko presence ecosystem ko balance ma madad garcha.

instruction: Nepali students ko lagi auta good financial management tip suggest gara.
output: Financial management ko lagi budget prepare gar, unnecessary expenses avoid gar, ra saving habits develop gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta mental health ko importance explain gara.
output: Mental health ko importance ho stress handle garna, productive life lead garna ra overall wellbeing maintain garna madad garcha.

instruction: Nepali history ma significant event ko auta short summary de.
output: Nepal ko unification process Prithvi Narayan Shah le suru gare, jasma usle chhoto rajya harulai milaera ek united Nepal banaune kaam gare.

instruction: Nepali ma auta personal development goal set garna example de.
output: Personal development goal ho ek mahina ma ek naya skill sikne, jasto ki basic cooking ya new language ko basics master garna.

instruction: Nepali ma auta effective time management tip de.
output: Time management ko lagi priority list bana, sabai kaam important level anusar divide gar, ra distractions minimize gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta inspiring historical figure ko naam de ra unko contribution explain gar.
output: Bhanu Bhakta Acharya ko contribution Nepali literature ma dherai thulo cha, uniharu le Ramayan lai Nepali ma translate garera literature popular banaye.

instruction: Nepali language sikna beginner haru ko lagi auta 5 din ko plan bana.
output: Day 1: Basic phrases jaise 'Namaste,' 'Tapai ko naam ke ho?' sik. Day 2: Numbers ra days of the week sik. Day 3: Daily life ma use hune sentences jaise 'Malai yo dinus' sik. Day 4: Nepali songs ya podcasts sunnu. Day 5: Learned words le short conversation practice gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta career planning tips de.
output: Career planning ko lagi afno interest ra strengths identify gar, relevant skills sikne plan bana ra networking ma focus gar.

instruction: Nepal ko popular tourist spot ko naam ra why it's special explain gara.
output: Popular spot ho Annapurna Base Camp. Yo trekking route le natural beauty, Himalayan views ra diverse culture experience garna milcha.

instruction: Nepali ma healthy diet maintain garna ko lagi tips de.
output: 1. Balanced diet kha jasma protein, carbs, ra vitamins huncha. 2. Processed food avoid gar. 3. Regular pani khanu mandatory cha.

instruction: Nepali students lai motivation dina short message lekha.
output: Sikne process ma patience ra consistency important ho. Galti hunecha tara tyo sikne part matra ho. Tapai ko mehnat le ek din safal banauchha.

instruction: Nepali ma auta environmental conservation ko idea propose gara.
output: Community-level tree plantation programs suru gar, reusable products promote gar ra river clean-up campaigns organize gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta public speaking tips de.

instruction: Nepali ma auta simple recipe lekha chai banune.
output: 1. Pani taat gar. 2. Ek chamcha chiya pati ra sugar add gar. 3. Milk add garera 5 minutes samma boil gar. 4. Strain garera serve gar.

instruction: Nepali youths lai encourage garna entrepreneurship ko barema short advice de.
output: Small start garna timid nabanna. Afno passion lai business idea ma convert gar ra continuous learning ma focus gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta positive mindset maintain garna tips de.
output: 1. Gratitude practice gar. 2. Negative thoughts avoid garera solution-oriented ban. 3. Daily positive affirmations repeat gar.

output: 'Sapana dekhera sabai safal hunchha bhanne hoina, sapana ko pachi mahnat garera lagatar ko koshish le safalta aaucha.'

instruction: Nepali ma auta productivity tips share gar.
output: Productivity badhauna multitasking avoid garera ek kaam ma focus gar, distraction-free environment ma kaam gar ra breaks liera energy maintain gar.

output: Local products kinera promote gar, social media ma reviews share gar ra word of mouth le local entrepreneurs lai support gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta time waste garne habits ko example de ra teslai kasari avoid garne suggest gara.
output: Example ho excessive social media use. Avoid garna time limit set gar ra productive activities ma focus gar.

output: Good team leader ko qualities ho clear communication, problem-solving skills, empathy ra team lai inspire garna sakne capacity.

output: SMART framework use gar: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound goals set gar.

output: 1. Ek bowl ma chiura rakh. 2. Piro achar mix gar. 3. Top ma onions ra lemon squeeze garera serve gar.

instruction: Nepali ma auta funny story lekha short.
output: Ek din teacher le Ramu lai sodhe, 'Ramayan ko writer ko naam?'. Ramu le chill voice ma bhancha, 'Sanskrit.'

output: Self-improvement suru garna afno weaknesses identify gar, clear goals set gar ra small positive habits develop gar.
